description: MCP server for structured access to Lenny Rachitsky podcast transcripts. For content creators.

examples.name: Basic Connection
examples.description: Connect to the Lenny Rachitsky Podcast MCP server to access and search podcast transcripts.
examples.config: Add 'https://lenny-rachitsky.run.mcp.com.ai/mcp' as a remote MCP server in your MCP client.

examples.name: Available Operations
examples.description: The server exposes podcast transcript search, retrieval, and metadata operations as MCP tools.
examples.note: See the OpenAPI spec for endpoints and schema: https://docs.mcp.com.ai/servers-apis/openapi/podcast-transcripts.yaml

notes: This MCP server is designed for influencers and content creators to make their content accessible to AI tools.
All that is needed are the transcripts in a structured format.
Lenny Rachitsky is a leading voice in product management and startups, hosting a popular podcast with industry experts.
No authentication required for public transcript access.
For production or private deployments, see the HAPI MCP server documentation.
